column1: Little Goat Diner////Suggestions from what I saw: the Fat Elvis looked awesome if you're sharing with two other people.  The cinnamon rolls were ooey
column2: gooey and looked amazing.  The shakes came in the old school diner glasses and one was even dairy free!  Next time I visit I'll have to try a burger and order a shake!  The side of fries are HUGE
column3: so be sure to order with the intention of sharing.
